‘한라봉’ (Hallabong), a type of sweet and sour tangerine, is one of the popular fruits that you must try at Jeju Island. 🍊

You can never go wrong with ice cream, and this Hallabong flavored sweet treat is just too good to resist. 🍦
🎥 - @holly_water_2 

#대한항공 #KE #Jeju https://t.co/aDRVgchStt

‘안동’ (An-Dong), about 3 hours away from Seoul, is well known for its relaxing and peaceful atmosphere🌿

Being away from the city and spending time in a forest filled with trees and green leaves will help you meditate 🌳

📷 IG - companionable_97

#KoreanAir #KE #An-Dong #안동 https://t.co/QEbcQ656Bq

‘빙수’ (Bing-Su), a shaved ice dessert with toppings, has been a favorite dessert in Korea. ❄️

Bing-su can be made up of red beans and different fruits such as the ones you see in the picture. 🍈🥭

What type of Bing-su would be your pick? 🍧

data.text:
Check out our beautiful B-777 on the runway of Zurich International Airport!☀️

Despite being busy, why don’t we take some time and enjoy the lovely weather of spring? 😉

#KoreanAir #KE #KEplanespotting

📷 https://t.co/GhRgWwuzFJ https://t.co/P1bn8upYT0
